---
title: "process_spatial02 - removing 2020 clean-up data"
author: "Sydney Rilum"
date: "2023-07-06"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# read in packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

# read in processed spatial data

```{r}
spdata_main <- read_csv(here("data", "processed", "spatialdata_01_main.csv"))
```

# data wrangling

```{r}
# remove clean-up data from the year 2020
spdata_no2020 <- spdata_main %>% 
  filter(!between(cleanup_date, as.Date('2020-01-01'), as.Date('2020-12-31')))
```

```{r}
# check that no 2020 is present in the data
unique(spdata_no2020$cleanup_date)
```

# save dataframe as spatialdata_02_no2020.csv

```{r}
write_csv(spdata_no2020, here("data", "processed", "spatialdata_02_no2020.csv"))
```
